Instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and grease a baking sheet.
Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth. Roll out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch. Cut into rounds and place on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until the loaf is golden brown. Let cool on a wire rack before slicing.
Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack before slicing.
